column8: 'Diamond' comes from the ancient Greek meaning 'Unbreakable'. Due to its unique molecular structure, it is almost impossible to cut, scratch or contaminate, making it one of the most sought-after and purest substances in the natural world. This design aims to express admiration for this unique stone.
column21: A t-shirt admiring the uniqueness of the Diamond. Beloved by jewelery enthusiasts and always controversial in the way it is sourced - particularly in Africa - the diamond has always been a source of fascination.
